name: 阮祥微
objective:
針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
Group Discussion.
schedule:
Week 1: Class Introduction
Week 2: Introduction to Business research and Group presentations
Week 3 - week 17: Group presentations and discussions
Week 18: Term paper submission
scorePolicy:
Class participation (attendance and in-class discussion): 20%
Group presentations: 50%
Term paper: 30%
materials:
Instructor provided materials.
Students prepared materials.
remarks: The students will be arranged into groups based on research interests and required to present research papers 2-3 times during the course.Term paper is individual project. Each student is required to write short essay of the interested topics and submit at the end of the semester.- Content must include: topic introduction, literature review, research gap, possible future research direction.- Word counts: 2000-5000 (excluding references) - Plagiarism check should be lower than 30%.
